topic.title: Population control - Total world sterilization through the Covid19-21 vaccination
topic.body:
The destruction of the human DNA. Vaccines takes years to make not because lack of money but as the result of the observation of adverse synonyms with animal test, money can not accelerate that, no way to shortcut this process. If you think, the labs and governments are here to help, you are wrong, you are on your own. MAy be this is your last chance to make a plan before the total reset that is coming.
The following links are videos from an expert, unfortunately in the shadows cause the Spanish and the country where this guy lives, but don't look at him, don't use the subtitle, just look for someone friend or family who can translate this for you as this is very important and noone in the English world is saying it.
https://youtu.be/OZIMqzxTc6I
https://halturnerradioshow.com/index.php/en/news-page/world/canada-going-tyrannical-2nd-total-lockdown-isolation-camps-for-refusers

Google for this guy
Dr Luis Marcelo Martínez
Médico genetista MN 107982
Presidente de la Sociedad Argentina de genética médica.
Con Maestría en Ingeniería genética y biología molecular (Univerdidad de Favaloro).
